title: Divyam Jhumkas: Exquisite Diamond-Studded Golden Bell Earrings
materials: and Emerald detail. Expertly crafted with high-quality stones for exceptional brilliance.
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design with intricate filigree work and delicate dangling golden beads (gundlu). The dome showcases a traditional South Indian pattern adorned with sparkling CZ diamonds. The top flower motif is embellished with Ruby and Emerald accents in a classic Kundan-inspired style.
colors: Predominantly Gold with the dazzling sparkle of white CZ diamonds
complemented by the rich red of the Rubies and vibrant green of the Emerald.
occasions: Ideal for traditional occasions like weddings (vadhuvu)
and important ceremonies. A perfect addition for Half-Saree functions or as bridal jewelry.
description: A timeless design blending traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a rich, lasting golden luster. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, making it a perfect blend of elegance and practicality. These Jhumkas exude sophistication and cultural richness, making them a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
